description:
PATCH NOTES:  1.2.2 - Back Gesture supported in the rename and match key screens.  1.2.1 - Fixed auto-win collision bug.  Moved server hosting to Amazon EC2.  Added in game online leader board.  You can access it from the main menu.

ABOUT:  In Robot Football you don't just call the plays, you design them!

Program your robots to run, block, pass, intercept, and steal the ball - while your opponent does the same! Once you've entered your plays, sit back and watch as both teams carry out their programming simultaneously. It's a battle of strategy and wits - do you have what it takes to out-think your opponent and score the touchdown?

FEATURES:

    * An original multiplayer football game
    * Online play against a friend or a random opponent
    * Hotseat (pass the phone) play
    * Configurable options when playing against friends
    * Slick graphics
    * Last play and full game replays
    * Win/loss tracking
